title: An Act relative to the prevailing wage in the town of Chatham

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Luddy of Orleans and Senator Cyr, a joint petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 4291) of Hadley Luddy (by vote of the town) relative to exempting the town of Chatham from the prevailing wage law.  Labor and Workforce Development.  [Local Approval Received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Labor and Workforce Development

related_entities.name: committee on Labor and Workforce Development

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 11/17/2025 from 11:00 AM-02:00 PM in B-1
Hearing rescheduled to 11/17/2025 from 11:00 AM-12:20 PM in B-1                                             and Virtual Hearing date changed
